## 14.1 Introduction

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```

## 14.2 Making numbers

```{r}
x <- c("$1,234", "USD 3,513", "59%")
parse_number(x)
```

## 14.3 Counts

```{r}
flights |> count(dest, sort = TRUE) |> View()
```

```{r}
flights |> count(tailnum, wt = distance, sort = TRUE)
```
